generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending across the frame.
- sidewalk: A paved pedestrian area with a curb is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Dense green trees and bushes are visible in the background and along the roadside.
- person: A woman is walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A dark-colored car is visible on the road, partially crossing the frame from right to left.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one with a traffic light and others supporting signs or traffic equipment.
- traffic light: A red traffic light is visible at the top right of the image.
- traffic sign: A small white sign with a bicycle symbol is visible in the middle distance, mounted on a pole.
- fence: A metal fence runs along the edge of the road, separating it from the vegetation behind it.
